comment:
* The contract between the provider of contact records on the device's SIM cards and applications. * Contains definitions of the supported URIs and columns. * *

Permissions

*

* Querying this provider requires {@link android.Manifest.permission#READ_CONTACTS} and writing * to this provider requires {@link android.Manifest.permission#WRITE_CONTACTS} *

variables.name: AUTHORITY
variables.comment: The authority for the SIM phonebook provider.

variables.name: AUTHORITY_URI
variables.comment: The content:// style uri to the authority for the SIM phonebook provider.

variables.name: SUBSCRIPTION_ID_PATH_SEGMENT
variables.comment:
* The Uri path element used to indicate that the following path segment is a subscription ID
     * for the SIM card that will be operated on.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public static String getEfUriPath(@ElementaryFiles.EfType int efType)
methods.comment:
* Returns the Uri path segment used to reference the specified elementary file type for Uris
     * returned by this API.
     *
     * @hide

methodNames: public static String getEfUriPath(@ElementaryFiles.EfType int efType)
